Articles.Content: This is an idea that's been kinda jumping around in my head a little bet. Would it be at all feasible to make a mod that will preform a boostback burn, a re-entry burn, and a hoverslam burn for a first stage?

Mechjeb can do all of that!  

Or with kRPC or KOS you could get it just how you want it with some scripting.  

Edited February 20, 2016 by artwhaley
